ValidationRule.description: You cannot convert a Lead with an Opportunity
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( IsConverted = TRUE, NOT(ISBLANK(ConvertedOpportunityId)), OR( $Profile.Name = 'Apollo: Custom- Support Profile', $Profile.Name = 'Apollo: Custom- Support Profile - Omni Channel' ) )
